org.apache.pig.piggybank.storage.avro

Class PigAvroDatumReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader<java.lang.Object>
      • org.apache.pig.piggybank.storage.avro.PigAvroDatumReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.avro.io.DatumReader<java.lang.Object>

    public class PigAvroDatumReader
extends org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader<java.lang.Object>
    An avro GenericDatumReader which reads in avro data and converts them to pig data: tuples, bags, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Construct where the writer's and reader's schemas are the same.

      Construct given writer's and reader's schema.
